sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-autocomplete
          v-model="selectedMember1"
          :items="member1"
          small-chips
          clearable
          color="gray"
          label="参加者を追加"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="name"
          multiple
          v-for="event in events" :key="event.id"
        >
        </v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex'

export default {
  name: 'GuestSelectForm',
  data: () => ({
    selectedItem: null,
    member1: [
      { name: 'A子' },
    ],
    selectedMember1: []
  }),
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('events', ['events', 'event']),
  },
  created() {
    this.fetchEvents();
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('events', [
      'fetchEvents',
      'updateEvent',
      'deleteEvent',
      'setEvent'
    ]),
  },
};
</script>
